SEARCH

Class Spaceship

java.lang.Object
Spaceship
public class Spaceship extends Object
This class moves your spaceship to the x, y coordinates that is entered and sets a default color to the body and outer flame.
Author:
henry

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Spaceship()
     
    Spaceship(int x, int y, int dx, int dy, Color color, Color color1)
    This is constructing a spaceship using the position of x, y, how they change, and the color of various spaceship graphic components.

  • Constructor Details

    • Spaceship

      public Spaceship(int x, int y, int dx, int dy, Color color, Color color1)
      This is constructing a spaceship using the position of x, y, how they change, and the color of various spaceship graphic components.
      Parameters:
      x - this will have x be equal to the given x_position
      y - this will have y be equal to the given y_position
      dx - this will set the initial change in x
      color - this will set the initial color of the spaceship body
      color1 - this will set the initial color of the outer flame
      dx - this will set the initial change in y

      public Spaceship()

      The main method to draw the spaceship.
      Parameters:
      g - Graphics to draw spaceship to frame

      The method to change the color of the body and flame to a random color.

      public void moveSpaceship()
      Method to move spaceship through change in x and y upon user key interaction(travel distance parameters created).
